segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl waits patiently, hand outstretched.

segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The peaceful garden view feels mocking right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn them all.
segments.speaker: PAR
